apps.name: GymTracker
apps.subtitle: Free workout tracker.

- Added rate of exertion
- Improve weight calculator

privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: We access your photos to let you scan barcodes for product identification.

privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: We use the camera to enable you to scan barcodes for product identification.
